i18n.title: Executing Child Processes in Rust
i18n.description: In this lab, we learn about child processes in Rust using the process::Output struct to represent the output of a finished child process and the process::Command struct to build processes. The example code demonstrates how to execute the rustc --version command and handle the output accordingly by checking if the process succeeded or failed.

meta.title: Rust Child Processes | Process Output | Command Execution
meta.description: Learn about child processes in Rust using the process::Output struct and process::Command. Discover how to execute commands and handle their output effectively.
meta.keywords: Rust, child processes, process output, process command, command execution

verify.name: This step has no verification at the moment
verify.hint: This step has no verification at the moment

i18n.title: 在 Rust 中执行子进程
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们学习 Rust 中的子进程，使用 process::Output 结构体来表示已完成的子进程的输出，并使用 process::Command 结构体来构建进程。示例代码展示了如何执行 rustc --version 命令，并通过检查进程是否成功来相应地处理输出。

meta.title: Rust 子进程 | 进程输出 | 命令执行
meta.description: 使用 process::Output 结构体和 process::Command 了解 Rust 中的子进程。探索如何有效执行命令并处理其输出。
meta.keywords: Rust, 子进程, 进程输出, 进程命令, 命令执行
